title: Qualitative Research-Based Curriculum for Improving Field Practicum Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens with practical experience in language education settings, conducting asynchronous learning activities via digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three learning obstacle factors that may occur in field practicum environments
Learners can write a report analyzing latent and educational elements of practicum environments using qualitative research methodologies
Learners can propose learning environment improvement plans by establishing collaborative action plans with peer learners and mentors
Learners can produce language education activity designs applicable to practicum settings based on analysis results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
